entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
